title: Nordstrom’s Summer Sale Has Some Incredible Home Finds — Here Are Some of the Best
text:
The Nordstrom Summer Sale may be at the end of the season, but that doesn’t make it any less impressive. There are deals on menswear, womenswear, kids, and home goods, which is what we’re focusing on today. Home goods is a pretty broad category, but we’ve given you a few of the top-rated items that Nordstrom has to offer that are part of the huge Summer Sale. Now, get to shoppin’.

All-Clad 10-Inch & 12-Inch Hard Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Fry Pan Set, $100 (33% off): You really can’t go wrong with a set of pans that will become your workhorses in the kitchen. Plus, they’re dishwasher-safe.

Click & Grow Smart Garden 9 Self-Watering Indoor Garden, $130 (35% off): As the days of tepid weather diminish, it’s time to think about your greenery. This indoor garden is sleek, compact, and ready to give you the herbs and plants you deserve.

Nest Cam IQ Indoor Security Camera, $180 (40% off): Keep an eye on things without having to hook up a whole system. The Cam IQ is a sleek home security camera that can be nestled into a bookshelf or placed front and center, depending on your style.

Treasure & Bond Relaxed Cotton & Linen Duvet Cover, $84 (50% off) - This cotton/linen blend duvet is what you’ll want to crawl into when the temperature starts to dip. Pair this with a throw blanket and some fun pillows for a bold but comfy bedroom.

Nordstrom Chevron 20-Inch Spinner Carry-On, $69 (50% off) - With a lightweight, crushproof outer shell, this spinner suitcase should be our new go-to. Multidirectional wheels, zip-compartment interior, and an integrated TSA lock mean traveling with it is a breeze.

Scouted is internet shopping with a pulse. Follow us on Twitter and sign up for our newsletter for even more recommendations and exclusive content. Please note that if you buy something featured in one of our posts, The Daily Beast may collect a share of sales.
description: From suitcases to duvet covers, we’ve rounded up a handful of the best home-related items to pick up from Nordstrom.
